formattedAddress: 55 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
So I’m in town visiting from California and my crown falls off. My dentist back home is relatively young and a little less experienced if I’m honest, which is relevant context if you consider my crown was placed only 6 months ago.

And so I was drawn to Dr. Towbin who appeared to have many years of experience. Thankfully he was able to see me the morning after the crown came off. As I suspected he’s extremely experienced. We even discussed the glue he chose to place to crown and why he preferred it.

Bravo, Dr. Towbin. Well done!

originalText.text: I got crown from Dr.Towbin, but it was terribly fit. I asked to fix the bite 3 times. But it didn't fit. Finally he was reluctant to fix the bite. I had to redo the crown by  different prosthodontist(Dr. Bo Y. Chun D.D.S).

originalText.text: Dr Towbin and his staff are great.  Have been going for a few years.

text.text: Dr Towbin and his staff are great.  Have been going for a few years.

originalText.text: Joesph Towbin!!! My favorite place to go when I need a clean smile!
